skills.name: Insolence
skills.shortDescription: Defy customs and propriety to use +Mettle.

skills.name: Boldly Go
skills.shortDescription: Find something profitable, useful, or awesome.

skills.name: Navigation
skills.shortDescription: Voyages are fast, safe, pleasant, or profitable.

skills.name: Trinkets
skills.shortDescription: Free Class 1 Cargo from foreign societies.

skills.name: Ritual
skills.shortDescription: Perform rituals, hexes and charms to use +Expertise.

skills.name: Alchemy
skills.shortDescription: Patch Up can corrupt, cleanse or transmute.

skills.name: Relic
skills.shortDescription: Gain a sacred Class 3 melee weapon.

skills.name: Animate
skills.shortDescription: A collection of objects becomes a Class 1 Crew.

skills.name: Strength
skills.shortDescription: Use violence, rage and brute force to use +Physique.

skills.name: Terrify
skills.shortDescription: Roll +Influence or Physique to terrify others.

skills.name: Launch
skills.shortDescription: Throw objects with +Mettle or +Physique.

skills.name: Stronger
skills.shortDescription: Destructive, Impacting and Penetrating strikes.

skills.name: Abnegation
skills.shortDescription: Surrender to indoctrination to use +Interface.

skills.name: False Identity
skills.shortDescription: Maintain fake identities, no Debt or Favor.

skills.name: Obsession
skills.shortDescription: Data Points are always about this subject.

skills.name: Linguist
skills.shortDescription: Read, write, and speak almost all languages.

skills.name: Tranquility
skills.shortDescription: Invoke koans and parables to use +Influence.

skills.name: Pact
skills.shortDescription: Your deity is a Faction, prayers call in Favors.

skills.name: Precognition
skills.shortDescription: Suffer minor mental harm, reroll a Move.

skills.name: Inspiration
skills.shortDescription: Roll+Influence/+Physique to spread an emotion.

skills.name: Cutting Edge
skills.shortDescription: +1 Interface, to a maximum of +2.

skills.name: Surveillance
skills.shortDescription: After an Access, you can continually track that person.

skills.name: Artificial Intelligence
skills.shortDescription: Gain a loyal AI NPC that can inhabit systems.

skills.name: Custom Flyer
skills.shortDescription: Gain a custom-designed Class 3 Flyer.

skills.name: Branded
skills.shortDescription: +1 Physique, to a maximum of +2.

skills.name: Assassination
skills.shortDescription: A 10+ Roll that kills someone leaves no evidence.

skills.name: Toughness
skills.shortDescription: You can suffer two injuries of each severity.

skills.name: Sneak Attack
skills.shortDescription: Roll+Mettle to kill, injure, rob, or capture a victim.

skills.name: Resourceful
skills.shortDescription: +1 Expertise, to a maximum of +2.

skills.name: Tinker
skills.shortDescription: Assemble shoddy weapons, explosives, and engineering kits.

skills.name: Custom Vehicle
skills.shortDescription: Gain a custom-designed Class 3 Land Vehicle.

skills.name: Heavy Lifting
skills.shortDescription: Ignore Clumsy caused by heavy weights.

skills.name: Affable
skills.shortDescription: +1 Influence, to a maximum of +2.

skills.name: Contacts
skills.shortDescription: Introduce a new NPC whenever you go anywhere civilized.

skills.name: Network
skills.shortDescription: Track, Get Involved, and issue Commands remotely.

skills.name: Bribe
skills.shortDescription: Acquisition makes political, legal and diplomatic purchases.

skills.name: Fine Tuning
skills.shortDescription: +1 Expertise, to a maximum of +2.

skills.name: Repair
skills.shortDescription: Your Patch Up repairs critical breakages, rebuilds machines.

skills.name: Weightless
skills.shortDescription: Ignore the Clumsy trait while flying, falling, or in zero-G.

skills.name: Program
skills.shortDescription: After Accessing a system, choose a behavior and a trigger.

skills.name: Scrappy
skills.shortDescription: +1 Mettle, to a maximum of +2.

skills.name: Stealth
skills.shortDescription: Vanish while unobserved, then show up at any later point.

skills.name: Recklessness
skills.shortDescription: Roll 1d6, 50% spectacular success, 50% abject failure.

skills.name: Criminal
skills.shortDescription: Crimes that roll 10+ leave no evidence.

skills.name: Decorum
skills.shortDescription: +1 Influence, to a maximum of +2.

skills.name: Fame
skills.shortDescription: People know you/your work. Allies can use your +Influence.

skills.name: Luxury
skills.shortDescription: Lavish lifestyle. Gain an NPC retainer (butler, consort, etc.).

skills.name: Scapegoat
skills.shortDescription: Roll+Expertise to pass on social/legal/financial harm.

skills.name: Vocation
skills.shortDescription: +1 Expertise, to a maximum of +2.

skills.name: Calibrations
skills.shortDescription: Get Involved+Interface to prepare a vehicle/console.

skills.name: Education
skills.shortDescription: When you gain a Data Point, share it with your allies.

skills.name: Acumen
skills.shortDescription: Find what to exploit, what’s in demand, or who’s in charge.

skills.name: Disciplined
skills.shortDescription: +1 Mettle, to a maximum of +2.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.shortDescription: Gain a hand-picked Class 3 Crew.

skills.name: Tactics
skills.shortDescription: You choose the consequences of Launch Assault/Open Fire.

skills.name: Deduction
skills.shortDescription: Discover vulnerabilities, dangers, or causes.

skills.name: Hard Labor
skills.shortDescription: +1 Physique, to a maximum of +2.

skills.name: Construction
skills.shortDescription: Build shelters, defenses, concealment, or workspaces.

skills.name: Survival
skills.shortDescription: Scrounge up food, medicine, wilderness kits, melee weapons.

skills.name: Chemistry
skills.shortDescription: Roll+Expertise to create antidote, vaccine, drug, poison, etc.
